idea-plugin.description:
Profiler Lens

Profiler Lens is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin that enables seamless visualization of Java application profiling results directly within your source code. By integrating with Java Flight Recorder (JFR) data, Profiler Lens highlights the methods that most impact performance, helping developers quickly identify and address bottlenecks without leaving their IDE.

Key Features

  • In-Editor Highlighting: Visualize profiling data directly within the code editor using intuitive background coloration. The intensity of the highlight reflects the resource consumption of each method.
  • JFR Integration: Supports profiling results generated by Java Flight Recorder, allowing direct interpretation of .jfr files. Other profilers that use the .jfr file format may be supported as well.
  • Session Comparison: Compare multiple profiling sessions to evaluate the effectiveness of code changes and optimizations.
  • On-Demand Visualization: Easily toggle profiling highlights via the IDE's context menu for a seamless workflow.

Benefits

  • Streamlines performance analysis by integrating profiling insights directly into your development environment.
  • Reduces cognitive load by eliminating the need to cross-reference external profiling tools.
  • Encourages proactive performance tuning as part of the regular development lifecycle.

Usage

  1. Use Select Profiling Result to load a .jfr file with your profiling data.
  2. Activate or deactivate in-editor highlights using Toggle Visualization.

Target Users

Java developers using IntelliJ IDEA who want to improve application performance through integrated profiling insights. Ideal for those who use Java Flight Recorder and wish to analyze profiling data without switching contexts.

Compatibility

Compatible with IntelliJ IDEA and other JetBrains IDEs based on the IntelliJ Platform.

Tested with projects compiled with JDK 17.

Source code & Feedback

Source code may be found in [GitHub](https://github.com/robertomahl/visual-java-profiler).

Found a bug or have a feature request? Please [open an issue](https://github.com/robertomahl/visual-java-profiler/issues) on GitHub.

Contributions, feedback, and feature suggestions are welcome!

Get Started

Install Profiler Lens from the JetBrains Plugin Marketplace and start enhancing your Java performance workflow today!
